projects.name: Gamplong Studio
projects.description: Comprehensive management system for Gamplong Studio tourism site in Yogyakarta featuring dynamic dashboard for monitoring studio equipment rentals and visitor analytics. Includes real-time asset tracking, visitor management, booking system, and detailed reporting for tourism operations.

projects.name: PT. Nadhif Putra Sejahtera
projects.description: Modern construction company profile website with comprehensive heavy equipment rental catalog, dynamic dashboard management, and integrated contact forms. Features include equipment availability tracking, rental booking system, project portfolio showcase, and admin panel for inventory management.

projects.name: Rumah Struktur
projects.description: Professional construction company profile website showcasing comprehensive structural engineering services. Features detailed service portfolio, project gallery, team expertise showcase, client testimonials, and integrated contact forms for project inquiries and consultations.

projects.name: Pertenunan Astiti
projects.description: Machine learning-powered traditional weaving website that educates visitors about various types of traditional Indonesian fabrics. Features AI-driven fabric recommendation system where users can input personal preferences and receive ML-based predictions for suitable fabric types, complete with detailed fabric information and cultural significance.

projects.name: Triandi Kreasi Utama
projects.description: Professional construction company profile website highlighting comprehensive building and infrastructure services. Features complete service portfolio, construction project showcase, company expertise overview, client success stories, and integrated contact forms for project consultations and estimates.

projects.name: Arthaloka Technology
projects.description: Corporate profile website for a technology company specializing in SaaS solutions and custom software development. Showcases comprehensive services including website development, mobile applications, IoT systems, and various software solutions with detailed service portfolios and client case studies.

projects.name: Aquadex
projects.description: Complete IoT water quality monitoring system with comprehensive web dashboard for real-time water cleanliness assessment. Monitors water turbidity and pH levels with automated alerts, historical data tracking, water quality analytics, and remote monitoring capabilities for ensuring safe water standards.
